source.name: Chainlink Oracle Networks
source.instructions: Which of the following statements best describes how Chainlink addresses the challenges of integrating oracles with blockchain technology?

answers.answer: By centralizing all data sources to ensure consistency
Through decentralized oracle networks that employ various security measures
By limiting smart contracts to on-chain data only
Using a single, highly secure oracle for all external data
By replacing blockchain consensus mechanisms with oracle-based verification

source.guidance: Chainlink addresses the challenges of integrating oracles with blockchain technology through decentralized oracle networks (DONs) that employ various security measures. This approach ensures data integrity and reliability while maintaining the decentralized nature of blockchain systems. The other options are incorrect because: centralizing data sources would compromise decentralization; limiting smart contracts to on-chain data would defeat the purpose of oracles; using a single oracle would create a single point of failure; and replacing blockchain consensus with oracle-based verification would fundamentally alter the blockchain's security model.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT analyze the key features and benefits of Chainlink's decentralized oracle networks
